content.rendered:
Labor Day Hours!

All Gottwals Books locations will be open for normal business hours on Labor Day. Come get your book fix!

*Perry Gottwals Books is always closed on Mondays

Get a $5 Gottwals Books T-Shirt!

Support your local independent bookstores by showing off the Gottwals Books logo. These shirts are available in green, blue, purple, and red. Pick one up in Byron, Macon, or Warner Robins.

Big Screen Books

Get Them Now At Gottwals:

  • The Giver (movie released Aug 15)
  • The Maze Runner (September)
  • Gone Girl (October)
  • Mockingjay (November)
  • Unbroken (December)

Spotlight: Gottwals Books in Macon

After four years on Northside Drive, Gottwals Books Macon recently relocated to Riverside Drive, just north of the Pierce Road I-75 exit. This location accommodates an expansive selection of fiction, nonfiction, and children’s books. We frequently feature popular local titles including the Macon Sketchbook, A Peculiar Tribe of People and books published by Mercer University Press.

Toy of the Week

Wooden Animal Nesting Block: $19.97

Explore the animal kingdom with these exciting wooden nesting blocks. From a tiny sea horse to a great big elephant, discover charming animals from four animal habitats. Stacked, they are almost three feet tall.
